body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun     Coloring Book                Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers Coloring Book       Follow these 3 simple steps to get your book started:  1) Click on a coloring page you would like. 2) Print the page out. 3) Have fun and be creative in your coloring!               W.E.B. DuBois            Paul Laurence Dunbar            Booker T. Washington             Cathay Williams - aka William Cathay The only female Buffalo Soldier in history.  First African-American female to enlist in the U.S. Army.  Learn more from the U.S. Army's Profile of Bravery.           Charles Young           Ada Young            Youngsholm            National Park Service Arrowhead
title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Coloring Book
